translation:
Due to the orders of Your Excellency Lieutenant Isaías with 24 men to surprise a guard of rebels said to be in Boa Vista, I will spend this night with the rest of the men on the other side fulfilling the orders that Your Excellency Juca Custódio is carrying out in the hills of Fortaleza and Santa Cruz with around 20 men.

That is what I have to inform Your Excellency for now.
